parameter.name: Date/Time Format
parameter.description: The format of the date to return. Provide the format that you want the date to be returned (i.e. "HH:mm:ss" or "yyyy-MM-dd" or any other format using the patterns for the SimpleDateFormat.

parameter.name: Server Time
parameter.description: The current time on the server in the format indicated by the format input parameter (default is HH:mm:ss).
